Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Wyndham Duisburger Hof, you'll be centrally located in Duisburg, steps from Theater Duisburg and Mercatorhalle Duisburg. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Museum Kuppersmuhle and Silberpalais.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 109 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary newspapers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, a hair salon, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Duisburg? This hotel has 8296 square feet (771 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Wyndham Duisburger Hof is Duesseldorf (DUS-Duesseldorf Intl.) - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Grand City Hotel Duisburger Hof is Dusseldorf (DUS-Dusseldorf Intl.) - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi.
